attributes.action: Improve bus punctuality within the North-East.
attributes.additional_details: The changes from this would benefit us highly as on many occasions, there has been a wait of 40+ minutes along with various different circumstances such as discrimination because of race, gender and sexuality. Towards both adults and children/young adults. As well as anti-social behaviour, people littering is a big issue, I believe that these changes will be able to create a safer and cleaner environment and hopefully change the reputation and quality of public transport for the greater good.
attributes.background: To develop bus punctuality by providing frequent bus services across the North-East and take action against anti-social behaviour alongside littering within buses as they can affect the quality of work from the bus drivers.
